name: The Fisherman [Lone Island]
description:
Lone Island is a series of virtual worlds that life could be if you are to be alone on an island.

#1 The Fisherman

If I were to live alone
I'm friends with solitude
Companied by stars at night
Weaving memories all-day

Let fear be your shadow
No one is judging
No one is glaring
None to offend

Being lonely is different
From being alone
It is freeing
Living comfortably in your own skin.
